work.name: Amazon
work.summary:
- Work with multiple research teams to develop multiple speech processing machine learning models (LSTM) / algorithms to enable the Halo Tone feature 
 - Used TensorFlow, CoreML, Python, Swift, Kotlin, Rust, and Spark

projects.name: Accurate Kernel Interpolation with Compactly Supported Kernels
projects.summary: This project aims to use compactly support kernels to make scalable KISS-GP Gaussian process framework more accuracte and efficient.
